title: NOTEPAD
subtitle: Online education solution
comment: A web-based online learning solution that supports multi-device compatibility
description: A versatile cross-device online solution, featuring a web-based responsive design, that seamlessly integrates an interactive whiteboard with an online learning platform. This comprehensive tool empowers users to engage in digital sketching, drawing, and facilitates the delivery of interactive online lessons. Whether accessed from desktops, tablets, or mobile devices, it provides a unified and adaptable experience across various platforms.

title: MOONGMIO
subtitle: SNS cartoon
comment: Serializing my personal stories in a cartoon format on Instagram.
description: I am actively sharing my personal stories in a cartoon format on Instagram using my own designed character. With approximately 2,800 followers, my Instagram comic series has gained significant engagement.

title: DAEKYO
subtitle: Corporate website
comment: Korea's leading educational company
description: Daegyo, as one of Korea's leading educational companies, engraves the mission that education is paramount in creating a happy and prosperous future for all. In line with this philosophy, I participated as the team leader of the Front-end Web Development team in a web enhancement project aimed at providing seamless services to everyone. Our goal was to ensure that the website reflects Daegyo's values and effectively delivers its services.

title: M2
subtitle: Building material calculator
comment: Automatically calculates materials for prefabricated buildings
description: As the Front-End Web Development Team Lead in the development of an application that automatically calculates materials for prefabricated buildings.

title: GIORDANO GROUP
subtitle: Store management panel
comment: The revamp project for Giordano.
description: The revamp project of the Management Panel for Giordano Group's online clothing stores (Giordano, BSX, Concepts One) involved enhancing and improving the administrative functionalities. This comprehensive undertaking aimed to streamline and optimize the management processes, ensuring seamless operations across the online stores. The project encompassed various aspects, including upgrading the user interface, refining the user experience, and implementing advanced features to enhance efficiency and productivity. By leveraging the latest technologies and best practices, the Management Panel was enhanced to provide an intuitive and user-friendly interface, empowering administrators to effectively manage orders, inventory, deliveries, and other essential aspects of the online stores.
